title: Sampler, 1813
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on cotton foundation
Technique: embroidered in cross, marking cross, stem, chain, satin and running (pattern darning) stitches on plain weave foundation
description: Eight darning crosses and one patch insertion.  Date and crowned initials in the center.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sampler, 1813.
1813. Medium: silk embroidery on cotton foundation
Technique: embroidered in cross, marking cross, stem, chain, satin and running (pattern darning) stitches on plain weave foundation. Bequest of Gertrude M. Oppenheimer. 1981-28-256.
